metadata.title: CVE-2019-11714 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Necko can access a child on the wrong thread during UDP connections, resulting in a potentially exploitable crash in some instances. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 68.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '68.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
